subject: Re: Could not connect to: 127.0.0.1:4306
msgSnippet: ... Thank you for thanking the people who helped you and thanks to those who helped. ... This comment is just not helpful if the only place you posted it is
messageBody:
--- In junit@y..., prasad charasala <charasala@y...> wrote:
> Naveen & Nils,

> sending that junitsupport.jar file. Yes you are right

> working fine now.

Thank you for thanking the people who helped you and thanks to those
who helped.

> If this is the case why the JUnit
> people still allowing to download the buggy
> junitsupport.jar file. I just downloaded that
> yesterday.

This comment is just not helpful if the only place you posted it is
this forum, as it is an Eclipse support issue.

Erik Meade
